original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘thanassitadārakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena thanassita dārakassa ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, thanassitadārako sadatthe laggati, khīratthiko rodati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja thanassita dārakaḥ sadatthe laggati khīratthikaḥ rodati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sadatthe laggitabbaṁ, sabbattha dhammañāṇena bhavitabbaṁ, uddese paripucchāya sammappayoge paviveke garusaṁvāse kalyāṇamittasevane.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sadatthe laggitabba sabbattha dhamma ñāṇena bhavitabba uddese paripucchāya sammappayoge pa viveke garu sa vāse kalyāṇa mitta sevane

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, thanassitadārakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: mahā rāja thanassita dārakassa ekam aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena dīghanikāyavare parinibbānasuttante—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena dīgha nikāya vare parinibbāna suttante

original: ‘Iṅgha tumhe, ānanda, sāratthe ghaṭatha, sāratthe anuyuñjatha, sāratthe appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathā’”ti.
analyzed: tumhe ānanda sāratthe ghaṭatha sāratthe anuyuñjatha sāratthe appamattāḥ ātāpinaḥ pahitattāḥ viharatha ati
